definition: to substitute/to act on behalf of others/to replace/generation/dynasty/age/period/(historical) era/(geological) eon

sentences.english: Short-lived Sui Dynasty, Tang Dynasty, will soon be replaced.
sentences.chinese: 隋朝短暂，很快被唐朝取代。

sentences.english: Mass armies (in most societies) have been replaced by highly trained professional-technical military forces.
sentences.chinese: 数量庞大的军队已经被高技术军队取代。

sentences.english: Is no substitute for showing off the core of her unique style.
sentences.chinese: 是否展露了无可取代的独特风格才是核心所在。

sentences.english: The influence of reaction conditions on the degree of substitution of acetylated starche was investigated.
sentences.chinese: 研究了反应条件对产品取代度和结构的影响。

sentences.english: I'm trying to displace him in his job.
sentences.chinese: 我在试图取代他的工作。

sentences.english: But these new techniques can not be instead of the traditional way completely.
sentences.chinese: 但目前这些新技术尚不能完全取代熔模精密铸造技术。

sentences.english: It's even been suggested that it could replace many dedicated point-and-shoot cameras.
sentences.chinese: 甚至还有人说，它可以取代许多专业的傻瓜相机。

sentences.english: In most fields, its use has been replaced by the ‘joule’.
sentences.chinese: 在大多数领域，这个单位已经被“焦耳”取代。

sentences.english: In this article the regularity of amino acid replacement among homologues insulins was explored.
sentences.chinese: 本文研究了同源胰岛素间氨基酸取代的规律性。

sentences.english: You can also set permissions using octal numbers instead of symbols.
sentences.chinese: 您还可以使用八进制取代符号设置权限。

sentences.english: It is used to thicken sauces and stews in place of flour and fat.
sentences.chinese: 它常用来勾芡酱汁，及在炖菜中取代面粉和脂肪。

sentences.english: Dunga had been in charge of his country since 2006, succeeding Carlos Alberto Parreira.
sentences.chinese: 邓加在06年取代佩雷拉成为国家队主帅至今。

sentences.english: Side mirrors are replaced by external cameras, located above the rear fenders .
sentences.chinese: 一面镜子取代外部摄像机，上方后方垫。

sentences.english: Some people think it quite possible for network classrooms to take the place of traditional classrooms.
sentences.chinese: 有些人认为网络教室很可能取代传统的教室。

sentences.english: And Iwant you to choose me instead of him.
sentences.chinese: 我希望你选择我，取代他。

sentences.english: Moderates have displaced the extremists on the committee.
sentences.chinese: 在委员会中，稳健派人士取代了激进派人士。

definition: to replace/to take the place of
to exchange/to replace/to substitute for/to switch
to substitute for sb/to remove and replace
to exchange (sth) for (sth else)/to replace with/to convert into
to change over to/to switch to/to use (sth different)
